name: gravitasbay.com
tag_list: social-commerce, e-commerce, ecommerce, facebook-application, africa, africa-startup
overview:
“gravitasbay.com” is an online community of marketplaces for social commerce allowing anyone to reach the growing and promising African consumer demographic securely.

The marketplace provides Africans access to products from global high street brands and private sellers by offering direct integration to the various leading electronic payment processing systems available in Africa including internet and mobile payment gateways. In recognition of certain social media platforms as the convergence point of active African internet users, the marketplace uses Facebook to extend the commercial and community interaction between sellers and buyers. It is free quick and easy for anyone to set up a shop as a Seller, drive traffic and generate sales. For buyers, gravitasbay offers an integrated marketplace and networked checkout where discovering, browsing and purchasing products from sellers across the world is quick, easy and simple. Most importantly buyers can pay securely using the various African payment methods we offer which continues to increase as we seek to extend our coverage across the continent.

The unique value we offer is access to the vast African market through our secure and guaranteed fraud free payment processes. Ignore the next greatest market in the World at your peril!! There are copyright issues; there is a different political system, as well as the obvious language barrier, cultural differences and alternative business code of conduct. Our knowledge of the local market and coupled with global exposure of our management team allows us to “think globally and act locally” to bring the much awaited and most sought after secure bridge to Africa. This enables commercial transactions to be actualised within the enclaves of trust which the world has been accustomed to over time.

Our mission is to pull down the barriers to ecommerce into and across the African continent be them financial, security, technical, psychological to empower people and brands to start selling over the internet to Africa.

relationships.title: Co-Founder & VP Business Development and Consumer Marketing
